DOC.brief_title: Comparing Hydrus Microstent ( TM ) iStent Lowering IOP Glaucoma Patients Undergoing Cataract Surgery ( COMPARE I )
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicenter , single-masked , randomized clinical trial compare Cataract Extraction ( CE ) + Hydrus Microstent CE surgery + iStent implant reduction intraocular pressure patient positive diagnosis primary open angle glaucoma , pseudoexfoliative glaucoma , pigmentary dispersion glaucoma operable cataract . Eligible patient schedule cataract surgery . At conclusion successful cataract surgery placement posterior-chamber IOL , qualify subject randomize receive either Hydrus Microstent iStent implant . Post-operative follow-up visit conduct regular interval .
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis primary open angle glaucoma ( POAG ) , Pseudoexfoliative ( PXG ) glaucoma , Pigmentary dispersion glaucoma ( PDG ) An operable agerelated cataract BCVA 20/40 worse , eligible phacoemulsification . Forms primary secondary glaucoma list Prior glaucoma surgery study eye
